00005 /* Graph library routines.  Commented code marked ccm was modified */
00006 /* to remove a system-dependent test that crashes when standard */ 
00007 /* input is used. C. McGeoch 1/91 */

00009 AddEdge (g,n,m,label)
00010 Graph g;
00011 int n,m,label;
00012 
00013 {       Edge edge1,edge2;
00014 
00015         edge1 = (Edge) malloc(2*sizeof(struct edge_ent));
00016         edge2 = edge1 + 1;
00017 
00018         edge1->label = label;
00019         edge1->endpoint = m;
00020         edge1->otheredge = edge2;
00021         edge1->prevedge = NULL;
00022         edge1->nextedge = g[n].adj_list;
00023         if (edge1->nextedge != NULL)
00024                 edge1->nextedge->prevedge = edge1;
00025         g[n].adj_list = edge1;
00026         g[n].degree++;
00027 
00028         edge2->label = label;
00029         edge2->endpoint = n;
00030         edge2->otheredge = edge1;
00031         edge2->prevedge = NULL;
00032         edge2->nextedge = g[m].adj_list;
00033         if (edge2->nextedge != NULL)
00034                 edge2->nextedge->prevedge = edge2;
00035         g[m].adj_list = edge2;
00036         g[m].degree++;
00037 }

00039 Edge FindEdge(graph,i,j)
00040 Graph graph;
00041 int i,j;
00042 
00043 {       Edge edge;
00044 
00045         edge = graph[i].adj_list;
00046         while (edge!=NULL && edge->endpoint!=j)
00047                 edge = edge->nextedge;
00048         if (edge==NULL) return(NULL);
00049         else return(edge);
00050 }
00051 
00052 int RemoveEdge(graph,edge)
00053 Graph graph;
00054 Edge edge;
00055 
00056 {       Edge other;
00057         int i,j;
00058 
00059         if (edge==NULL) return(0);
00060         other = edge->otheredge;
00061         i = other->endpoint;
00062         j = edge->endpoint;
00063         graph[i].degree--; graph[j].degree--;
00064         if (edge->prevedge == NULL) {
00065                 graph[i].adj_list = edge->nextedge;
00066                 if (edge->nextedge != NULL)
00067                         edge->nextedge->prevedge = NULL;
00068                 }
00069         else if (edge->nextedge == NULL)
00070                 (edge->prevedge)->nextedge = NULL;
00071         else {
00072                 (edge->nextedge)->prevedge = edge->prevedge;
00073                 (edge->prevedge)->nextedge = edge->nextedge;
00074                 }
00075         if (other->prevedge == NULL) {
00076                 graph[j].adj_list = other->nextedge;
00077                 if (other->nextedge != NULL)
00078                         other->nextedge->prevedge = NULL;
00079                 }
00080         else if (other->nextedge == NULL)
00081                 (other->prevedge)->nextedge = NULL;
00082         else {
00083                 (other->nextedge)->prevedge = other->prevedge;
00084                 (other->prevedge)->nextedge = other->nextedge;
00085                 }
00086         free((edge < other) ? edge : other);
00087         return(1);
00088 }
00089 
00090 int NumEdges(g)
00091 Graph g;
00092 {       int i,size,edges;
00093 
00094         edges = 0;
00095         size = Degree(g,0);
00096         for (i=1; i<=size; i++)
00097                 edges += Degree(g,i);
00098         edges /= 2;
00099         return(edges);
00100 }
00101 
00102 Graph NewGraph(size)
00103 int size;
00104 {       Graph tmp;
00105         int i;
00106 
00107         tmp = (Graph) malloc((size+1)*sizeof(struct node_entry));
00108 
00109         for (i=1; i<=size; i++) {
00110                 Degree(tmp,i) = 0;
00111                 FirstEdge(tmp,i) = NULL;
00112                 NLabel(tmp,i) = i;
00113                 }
00114 
00115         Degree(tmp,0) = size;
00116         return(tmp);
00117 }

00119 EuclidGraph NewEuclid(size)
00120 int size;
00121 {
00122         EuclidGraph xy;
00123 
00124         xy = (EuclidGraph) malloc((size+1)*2*sizeof(int));
00125         xy[0][0] = size;
00126         return(xy);
00127 }
00128 
00129 MatrixGraph NewMatrix(size)
00130 int size;
00131 {
00132         MatrixGraph graph;
00133         int i;
00134 
00135         graph = (MatrixGraph) malloc((size*(size+1)+1)*sizeof(int));
00136         graph[0] = size;
00137 
00138         for (i=1; i<=size; i++)         /* zero the diagonal */
00139                 graph[i*(size+1)] = 0;
00140 
00141         return(graph);
00142 }

00144 Graph CopyGraph(g)
00145 Graph g;
00146 {       int i,j,size;
00147         Edge edge;
00148         Graph cp;
00149 
00150         size = Degree(g,0);
00151         cp = NewGraph(size);
00152         for (i=1; i<=size; i++) {
00153                 Xcoord(cp,i) = Xcoord(g,i);
00154                 Ycoord(cp,i) = Ycoord(g,i);
00155                 edge = FirstEdge(g,i);
00156                 for (j=1; j<=Degree(g,i); j++) {
00157                         if (i < EndPoint(edge))
00158                                 AddEdge(cp,i,EndPoint(edge),ELabel(edge));
00159                         edge = NextEdge(edge);
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162         return (cp);
00163 }

00167 Graph ReadGraph (size,file)
00168 int *size;
00169 char file[];
00170 
00171 {       Graph graph;
00172         FILE *fp;
00173         char c;
00174         int edges, degree, vlabel, elabel, adj_node, i, j;
00175         int xcoord, ycoord;
00176 
00177 /*ccm   if (file[0] == `\0`) fp = stdin; */
00178 
00179         if (file == 0) fp = stdin;
00180         else fp = fopen(file,"r");
00181 
00182         if (fp==NULL) {
00183                 printf("ReadGraph: file %s can't be opened\n",file);
00184                 exit(0);
00185                 }
00186 
00187         fscanf(fp,"%d%d %c",size,&edges,&c);
00188 
00189         if (c !='U' && c!='u') {
00190                 printf("ReadGraph: file %s does not contain an undirected graph\n",file);
00191                 exit(0);
00192                 }
00193         
00194         while (getc(fp)!='\n') ;
00195 
00196         graph = NewGraph(*size);
00197 
00198         for (i = 1; i <= *size; ++i) {
00199                 fscanf(fp,"%d%d%d%d",&degree,&vlabel,&xcoord,&ycoord);
00200                 NLabel(graph,i) = vlabel;
00201                 Xcoord(graph,i) = xcoord;
00202                 Ycoord(graph,i) = ycoord;
00203                 while (getc(fp)!='\n') ;
00204                 for (j = 1; j <= degree; ++j) {
00205                         fscanf(fp,"%d%d", &adj_node, &elabel);
00206                         while (getc(fp)!='\n') ;
00207                         if (i<adj_node)
00208                                 AddEdge (graph,i,adj_node,elabel);
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211         fclose(fp);
00212         return(graph);
00213 }

00215 WriteGraph (graph,file)
00216 Graph graph;
00217 char file[];
00218 
00219 {       FILE *fp;
00220         int size, i,j,edges;
00221         Edge p;
00222 
00223         if (file == 0) fp = stdout;
00224         else fp = fopen(file,"w");
00225         if (fp==NULL) {
00226                 printf("WriteGraph: file %s can't be opened\n",file);
00227                 exit(0);
00228                 }
00229         size = Degree(graph,0);
00230         edges = NumEdges(graph);
00231         fprintf(fp,"%d %d U\n",size,edges);
00232 
00233         for (i = 1; i <= size; i++) {
00234                 fprintf(fp,"%d %d %d %d L\n",Degree(graph,i),NLabel(graph,i),
00235                                            Xcoord(graph,i),Ycoord(graph,i));
00236                 p = FirstEdge(graph,i);
00237                 for (j = 1; j <= Degree(graph,i); ++j) {
00238                         fprintf(fp,"%d %d L\n",EndPoint(p),ELabel(p));
00239                         p = NextEdge(p);
00240                         }
00241                 }
00242         fclose(fp);
00243 }

00245 EuclidGraph ReadEuclid(size,file)
00246 int *size;
00247 char file[];
00248 
00249 {       EuclidGraph graph;
00250         FILE *fp;
00251         char c;
00252         int i,xcoord, ycoord;
00253 
00254 /*ccm   if (file[0]=='\0') fp=stdin; */
00255 
00256         if (file == 0) fp= stdin;
00257         else fp = fopen(file,"r");
00258         if (fp==NULL) {
00259                 printf("ReadEuclid: file %s can't be opened\n",file);
00260                 exit(0);
00261                 }
00262         fscanf(fp,"%d %c",size,&c);
00263         if (c!='E' && c!='e') {
00264                 printf("ReadEuclid: file %s isn't Euclidean\n",file);
00265                 exit(0);
00266                 }
00267         while (getc(fp)!='\n');
00268         graph = NewEuclid(*size);
00269 
00270         for (i=1; i<=*size; ++i) {
00271                 fscanf(fp,"%d%d",&xcoord,&ycoord);
00272                 while (getc(fp)!='\n') ;
00273                 graph[i][0] = xcoord;
00274                 graph[i][1] = ycoord;
00275                 }
00276         fclose(fp);
00277         return (graph);
00278 }

00280 WriteEuclid(graph,file)
00281 EuclidGraph graph;
00282 char file[];
00283 
00284 {       FILE *fp;
00285         int size, i;
00286 
00287         if (file == 0) fp = stdout;
00288         else fp = fopen(file,"w");
00289         if (fp==NULL) {
00290                 printf("WriteEuclid: file %s can't be opened\n",file);
00291                 exit(0);
00292                 }
00293         size = graph[0][0];
00294         fprintf(fp,"%d E\n",size);
00295         for (i = 1; i <= size; i++) 
00296                 fprintf(fp,"%d %d\n",graph[i][0],graph[i][1]);
00297         fclose(fp);

00300 MatrixGraph ReadMatrix(size,file)
00301 int *size;
00302 char file[];
00303 {       MatrixGraph graph;
00304         FILE *fp;
00305         char c;
00306         int i,j,k;
00307 
00308 /*ccm   if (file[0] == '\n') fp=stdin;  */
00309 
00310         if (file == 0) fp=stdin;
00311         else fp = fopen(file,"r");
00312 
00313         if (fp==NULL) {
00314                 printf("ReadMatrix: file %s can't be opened\n",file);
00315                 exit(0);
00316                 }
00317         fscanf(fp,"%d %c",size,&c);
00318         if (c!='M' && c!='m') {
00319                 printf("ReadMatrix: file %s isn't a distance matrix\n",file);
00320                 exit(0);
00321                 }
00322         while (getc(fp)!='\n');
00323         graph = NewMatrix(*size);
00324 
00325         for (i=1; i<*size; i++) {
00326                 for (j=i+1; j<=*size; j++) {
00327                         fscanf(fp,"%d",&k);
00328                         graph[i*(*size)+j] = graph[j*(*size)+i] = k;
00329                         }
00330                 while (getc(fp)!='\n');
00331                 }
00332         fclose(fp);
00333         return(graph);
00334 }

00336 WriteMatrix(graph,file)
00337 MatrixGraph graph;
00338 char file[];
00339 
00340 {       FILE *fp;
00341         int size, i, j;
00342 
00343         if (file == 0) fp =  stdout; 
00344         else fp = fopen(file,"w");
00345         if (fp==NULL) {
00346                 printf("WriteMatrix: file %s can't be opened\n",file);
00347                 exit(0);
00348                 }
00349         size = graph[0];
00350         fprintf(fp,"%d M\n",size);
00351         for (i = 1; i < size; i++) {
00352                 for (j=i+1; j<=size; j++)
00353                         fprintf(fp,"%d ",graph[i*size+j]);
00354                 fprintf(fp,"\n");
00355                 }
00356         fclose(fp);
00357 }

00359 /* Euclidean distance routines */
00360 
00361 int eucdist (graph,i,j) /* Find the distance between two points */
00362                         /* 10K x 10K unit square */
00363 EuclidGraph graph;
00364 int i,j;
00365 {       int dv,dh;
00366         register int k, l;
00367 
00368         dv = graph[i][0]-graph[j][0];
00369         dh = graph[i][1]-graph[j][1];
00370         k = dv*dv + dh*dh;
00371         if (k==0) return(0);
00372         if (dv<0) dv = -dv;
00373         if (dh<0) dh = -dh;
00374         l = dv + dh;
00375         l = (l + k/l)>>1;
00376         l = (l + k/l)>>1;
00377         l = (l + k/l)>>1;
00378         l = (l + k/l)>>1;
00379         return ((l*l<k) ? ++l : l);
00380 }
00381 
00382 
00383 int eucdist2 (graph,i,j) /* Find the distance between two points */
00384                         /* 1M x 1M unit square */
00385 EuclidGraph graph;
00386 int i,j;
00387 {       double dv,dh,d;
00388         int l;
00389 
00390         dv = (double) graph[i][0]-graph[j][0];
00391         dh = (double) graph[i][1]-graph[j][1];
00392         d  = sqrt(dv*dv + dh*dh);
00393         l  = (int) d;
00394         return((d-l > .000000001) ? l+1 : l);
00395 }
00396 
00397 
00398 int eucdistsq(graph,i,j) /* Find the square of the dist between two points */
00399 EuclidGraph graph;
00400 int i,j;
00401 {
00402         register int dv,dh;
00403 
00404         dv = graph[i][0]-graph[j][0];
00405         dh = graph[i][1]-graph[j][1];
00406         return(dv*dv+dh*dh);
00407 }
